mapper.select: SELECT r.id,r.buyer_id,r.buyer_name,r.code,r.created,r.modified, r.product_name,r.product_stock_id,r.reason,r.return_status,r.seller_id,r.seller_name,r.spec_name, r.trade_order_Id,r.trade_weight,r.weight_unit FROM trade_request r,trade_order o WHERE o.id = r.trade_order_Id AND (r.buyer_id = #{buyerId} OR r.seller_id = #{buyerId}) and (r.created >= #{createdStart} and r.created <=#{createdEnd}) and o.order_status = #{orderStatus}

SELECT d.`trade_request_id` requestId,d.`id` detailId, d.`total_weight` orderNum, d.`bill_id` thirdEnterId, p.`trade_request_id` thirdOrderParentId, d.`parent_id` thirdOrderDetailParentId, IF(d.`weight_unit`=1,'斤','公斤') unitName FROM `trade_detail` d LEFT JOIN `trade_detail` p ON d.`parent_id` = p.`id` WHERE d.`trade_request_id` in
#{id}
